objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='mainGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#0A1933'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#1E487A'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='spotlightGradient' cx='50%' cy='40%' r='60%' fx='50%' fy='40%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#3466AA' stop-opacity='0.4'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#0A1933' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#mainGradient)'/><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#spotlightGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='1080' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='540' y1='0' x2='540' y2='1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='0' y1='540' x2='1080' y2='540' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/></g><path d='M0 880 C 180 920, 360 900, 540 880 S 720 860, 900 880 S 980 920, 1080 900 L 1080 1080 L 0 1080 Z' fill='#122B4D' fill-opacity='0.7'/></svg>

objects.text: Premium 100ml Fragrance • Elegant Frosted Glass • Exclusive Signature Scent

product_details.name: Good Man by MAXIMOR - Sophisticated Luxury Eau de Parfum for the Modern Gentleman
product_details.description:
• Premium 100ml/3.3 FL.OZ eau de parfum concentration for longer-lasting fragrance
• Elegant blue frosted glass bottle with sophisticated minimalist design
• Exclusive MAXIMOR signature fragrance for distinguished gentlemen
• Professional black cap with superior spray mechanism
• Perfect blend of masculine notes crafted for daily and special occasions
• Luxurious packaging ideal for gifting
• High-quality fragrance made with refined ingredients
• Sleek and modern bottle design that adds elegance to any vanity
• Generous 100ml size offering excellent value
• Distinctive MAXIMOR brand emblem representing luxury and quality

banner_details:
This premium banner design features a sophisticated fragrance advertisement with a luxurious and masculine mood. The banner is centered around a vertically placed frosted glass perfume bottle (`product_image`) that draws immediate attention. Above the bottle is a strong, bold title (`heading`) complemented by an elegant brand name (`subheading`) and a refined tagline (`description`), emphasizing the product's exclusivity. Surrounding the composition is a radial grid overlaid on a gradient background, adding subtle depth and direction. Below the product image, supporting feature points (`features`), a lifestyle tagline (`tagline`), and a bold price highlight (`price`) lead naturally into a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with inviting text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A1933
- Deep Blue: #1E487A
- Steel Blue: #A8C0E5
- Frosted White: #FFFFFF
- Soft Peach: #FFCFA3
- Accent Blue (CTA): #A2C1EF
- CTA Text: #0A1933
product_color: The product image features a sleek, elegant design with a dominant color palette of deep midnight blue (#1A2639), gradient steel blue (#4682B4), and hints of muted lavender (#8C9BB1). The bottle’s glass surface gradually transitions from a rich, dark blue at the base to a lighter, desaturated blue towards the top, highlighting sophistication and modern masculinity. The black cap (#1C1C1C) adds contrast while the white text (#FFFFFF) and logo stand out crisply against the cool-toned backdrop. The blending of blues with high contrast monochrome elements creates a clean, upscale aesthetic ideal for a luxury advertisement banner.
